PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
ZDO_EndDeviceBindResp_t Struct Reference

(ClusterID = 0x8020) This response is generated by the ZigBee Coordinator in response to End Device Bind Request and contains the status of the request. This command shall be unicast to each device involved in the bind attempt, using acknowledged data sevice. More...

#include <zdo.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t status

Detailed Description

(ClusterID = 0x8020) This response is generated by the ZigBee Coordinator in response to End Device Bind Request and contains the status of the request. This command shall be unicast to each device involved in the bind attempt, using acknowledged data sevice.

Definition at line 990 of file zdo.h.

Field Documentation

uint8_t ZDO_EndDeviceBindResp_t::status

The status of the End Device Bind Request command.
